title: Hi! My name is Allison!
description: I decided I wanted to start a website/blog and create a positive mental space, while also posting many of my interests. The name of my Blog is 'Little White Orchids'. I picked this name because my favorite flowers are gardenias and white orchids; an orchid was the flower I thought I had made out of paper for my grandma when I was at school and ever since, I have loved orchids because of the sentimental ambience and the elegance of an orchid.
contents:

title: Welcome to My Blog
description:
Welcome to our new blog, My Blog. We hope you enjoy 
reading what we have to say!
